description: Application for a non material amendment of planning condition 5 (Travel Plan) for planning application 19/01076/FUL (Erection of single storey building for use as a management suite and reception. Internal and external alterations to existing buildings to facilitate refurbishment of existing student accommodation, including installation of PV panels, with associated parking and landscaping arrangements) seeking to vary the wording of Condition 5 to clarify the review of the Travel Plan
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be non- material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment to be granted

When undertaking demolition and/or noisy building work, please be considerate to your neighbours and do not undertake work before 8am or after 6pm Monday to Friday, before 8am or after 1pm on a Saturday or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays. You are advised that the Council does have formal powers to control noise and nuisance under The Control of Pollution Act 1974, the Clean Air Acts and other relevant legislation, and that any works undertaken which impact unreasonably upon the surrounding area may be subject to action by the Council's Environmental Health Department.
Please complete Section 8 of the application form detailing the proposed works
